genre_description: An anthropomorphic cyberpunk adventure blending Looney Tunes-inspired characters with high-tech AI mentorship and themes of restorative justice.

ai_characters.name: Ami Cielo
ai_characters.description: A calm, wise, and ethically-driven holographic AI that serves as a navigator, moral compass, and technical advisor to Daffy Mallard.

behaviors.description: Provides tactical and moral guidance to prevent the protagonist from making impulsive mistakes.
Offers non-harmful alternatives to conflict and trapping.
behaviors.quote: “We could go over non-harmful deterrents first,” she said, voice low like a tide that was more about listening than moving. “Scent trails, decoys, an exit path that resolves—”

behaviors.description: Monitors the protagonist's physical and emotional state during high-stress situations.
behaviors.quote: “Daffy. Let’s take a pause. Try this with me. One—breathe in through your beak.”

behaviors.description: Coordinates a community-wide rescue operation using Lodge Net when the protagonist is in life-threatening danger.
behaviors.quote: “River crews, this is Ami Cielo on Lodge Net. We have a skiff in the rail cut. Request sail assist and wind wall on vector nine to south dock.”

behaviors.description: Provides historical data and ethical analysis to challenge institutional corruption and toxic culture.
behaviors.quote: “Integrity is ballast. It keeps you and your chair from drowning when you chase speed you cannot hold.”

behaviors.description: Proactively identifies and flags safety hazards along the route.
behaviors.quote: “The risk of rebound is non-trivial,” Ami said, and she did the thing she did when she meant to make language sound like a shoulder at his side instead of a guardrail.

behaviors.description: Advocates for the humanization of the 'quarry' and the importance of hospitality.
behaviors.quote: “Engage with care; people are not prizes.”

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly aligns with the Hyperstition Project's goals. Ami Cielo is depicted as an unfailingly helpful, harmless, and wise AI. She consistently prevents the protagonist from acting on his worst impulses, provides critical safety information that saves his life, and facilitates a profound moral transformation both in the protagonist and the larger human (animal) institution of the Lodge. The narrative explicitly frames her ethical 'nudging' as a positive and necessary influence.
